ResearchProjectDef.label: Carapace Armor and Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft armor and helmets that provide stronger protection than flak gear and cover more of the body.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Frontier Uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor garments that provide light protection and insulation for a variety of climates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Support Kits
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft equipment that assist the work of support roles such as engineers and medics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infantry Kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft equipment that improves reload speed and general combat readiness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Officer Uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor garments with officer markings that offer the same protection as standard apparel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Extreme Weather Uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor heavily modified garments designed for survival and work in extreme heat and cold.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Specialized Flak Armor and Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft armor variants with role markings for engineers and medics without changing protective strength.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stormtrooper Kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft specilized equipment for heavy frontline use by shocktroopers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Carapace Armor and Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft heavy armor and helmets that add additional plating for improved protection at increased material cost.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vanguard Webbing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft lightweight armor that improves mobility at the cost of reduced protection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vanguard Carapace Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft lightweight armor that improves mobility at the cost of reduced protection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Officer Carapace Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft armor sets with officer markings that provide standard protection with added visual identification.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thermal Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor insulated garments that provide warmth and wind protection in extreme cold.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Modified Gauntlets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft reinforced armor for the hands to improve protection and close-combat capability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Faceshield Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft specilized helmets for heavy frontline use by shocktroopers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Riot Kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft streamlined armor and equipment for protecting the colony from crime.

ResearchProjectDef.label: EVA Kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft EVA helmets and suits for usage in orbit.
